text.cc2.resource_pack_test:
Resource pack is installed.
Content will be displayed in %s.
text.cc2.rules.details:
§e«1»§r This map should be played in %1$s.
◆ Loading the save with non-vanilla Minecraft may break the map. %2$s
◆ Avoid using external datapacks & resourcepacks.

§e«2»§r Do not cure zombie villagers.
◆ You are only allowed to trade with villagers provided by the map.

§e«3»§r Do not craft or break ender chests.
◆ You are only allowed to use ender chests placed in the map.

§e«4»§r Stay within the map range.
◆ Do not try to escape the bedrock border.
◆ Do not travel to the nether or the end.

§e«5»§r Do not cheat.
◆ Any cheat commands might break the map in ways you didn't think of!
text.cc2.vanilla_definition.title: Some examples of things that are %s vanilla:
text.cc2.vanilla_definition:
◆ Fabric & Forge are not vanilla, even if no mods are installed.
◆ OptiFine is not vanilla.
◆ Feather Client is not vanilla.
◆ Paper server is not vanilla.

We have confirmed that Fabric + Sodium only break some textures.
If this is acceptable, you can play the map with Sodium installed.
text.cc2.music.details:
Some areas (area 8, 13 and 15) have background music.
The volume can be adjusted in the %s category.
◆ A cat meow was just played in the music category.
◆ All music are allowed to be used in game and played on YouTube.
◆ However, we don't guarantee absolute safety. After all, even C418's music can cause trouble.
text.cc2.intro.details:
This is a CTM map made by 27 mapmakers in the %2$s.

◆ Objectives: 16 required + 2 bonus
◆ Player count: 1 ~ 4
◆ Time estimated: 16 ~ 30 hours
◆ Difficulty: Medium

%1$s
text.cc2.ctm:
CTM means %1$s.
The objective is to collect 16 colors of specified wools, and place them on the monument.
◆ Specified wool looks like this: %2$s

Except for certain areas, this map is played in survival mode. Survive by any means you can think of.
monument.howto.glass: I can walk on glass. It does not hurt me.
